title: SOLD: T213 Coupons, McGraw, Jennings, & Chase...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: T213 Coupons, McGraw, Jennings, & Chase...
posts.post_content:
SOLD, a trio of T213-2 Coupon Cigarette cards depicting 2 HOFers and a gambler.  They present wonderfully for an issue that is normally very condition sensitive.

Prices are net to me, in the continental U.S. Tax free.  Shipping is $4.

Commitment to purchase supercedes any ongoing negotiation.  

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]

[quote name="griffon512" post=2014907]I'll take them[/QUOTE]

Awesome buy. Wish I had seen them!

[quote name="Aquarian Sports Cards" post=2014914]Awesome buy. Wish I had seen them![/QUOTE]

thanks, I always liked the color on these cards.  have a good holiday weekend.
